...Subhash Kapoor is an Indian film director, producer  and screenwriter.  He was a political journalist, and later became known for directing the satirical comical dramas like Phas Gaye Re Obama (2010) and Jolly LLB (2013).

...The State vs Jolly LL. B 2, known also as Jolly LL. B 2, is a 2017 Indian black comedy film, written and directed by Subhash Kapoor.  A sequel to the 2013 film Jolly LLB, and the second installment of Jolly LLB (film series).  The film stars Akshay Kumar, Huma Qureshi {{ Huma Qureshi (actress) }} , Saurabh Shukla and Annu Kapoor in lead roles.  A courtroom drama which satirizes the notion of the Indian legal system, the story follows Jagdishwar Mishra (Akshay Kumar),...

...Jolly LLB is a 2013 Indian Hindi-language courtroom black comedy-drama film, written and directed by Subhash Kapoor.  The film stars Arshad Warsi, Boman Irani and Amrita Rao in the lead roles.  The theatrical trailer was revealed on 8 January 2013.  Released on 15 March 2013, the film revolves around the early life of lawyer Jagdish Tyagi a. k. a.  Jolly (played by Warsi) and focuses on his attempt to earn six innocent wage earners their rights and his journey against the...

...Jolly LLB is a series of Indian Hindi-language courtroom  black comedy-drama film, written and directed by Subhash Kapoor and produced by Vijay Singh, under Fox Star Studios.
Remake 2013 film Jolly LLB has been remade into Tamil film Manithan in 2016.

...It is the first installment of Jolly LLB (film series)The film won the National Film Award for Best Feature Film in Hindi, while Saurabh Shukla won the National Film Award for Best Supporting Actor.  The film has been remade as Manithan {{ Manithan (2016 film) }} .  A sequel, Jolly LLB 2 was released in February 2017. Plot
